name: trala
description: Trala is a self-hosted personal finance and budgeting application with transaction tracking, categorization, and summaries, giving individuals a clear overview of their money.
features: Transaction tracking: Record income and expenses with dates, amounts, categories, and descriptions.
Budget management: Set monthly budgets by category and track spending against targets.
Category system: Organize transactions with customizable categories for detailed financial analysis.
Account management: Track multiple accounts like checking, savings, and credit cards separately.
Financial summaries: View summaries showing income, expenses, and net worth over time.
Trend analysis: Identify spending patterns and trends with charts and visualizations.
Recurring transactions: Set up recurring income or expenses that are automatically logged.
Search and filter: Find transactions using search and filter by date, category, or amount.
Reports: Generate financial reports for specific periods to review spending and income.
Privacy-focused: Keep all financial data on your own server with no third-party access.
Mobile-friendly: Manage finances from mobile devices with a responsive interface.
Export data: Export transaction data for backup or analysis in spreadsheet applications.
